name: Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings, Inc.
description: Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings, Inc. is a leading global outdoor advertising company that provides innovative advertising solutions across various platforms, including billboards, street furniture, and transit advertising. Founded in 1901 and headquartered in San Antonio, Texas, Clear Channel Outdoor operates in over 30 countries and is recognized for its extensive inventory of outdoor advertising displays. The company focuses on leveraging technology to enhance advertising effectiveness, utilizing digital billboards and data-driven insights to optimize ad placements. Through its commitment to sustainability, Clear Channel Outdoor aims to reduce its environmental impact by utilizing energy-efficient technologies in its advertising displays. With a wide range of advertising products, the company caters to various advertisers, from local businesses to global brands, enabling them to connect with consumers in impactful ways. Clear Channel Outdoor is dedicated to fostering community engagement and enhancing public spaces through creative advertising solutions that resonate with audiences. As part of its growth strategy, the company continues to explore new digital advertising opportunities and partnerships to stay ahead in the competitive landscape of outdoor advertising.
